==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=桃园结义|type=22|lit=Oath of the Peach Garden}}

===Etymology===
From the ''{{w|Romance of the Three Kingdoms}}'', in which {{w|Zhang Fei}}, {{w|Guan Yu}}, and {{w|Liu Bei}} made an oath in the peach garden.
[[Image:Three_Brothers.jpg|thumb|''Three Heroes of Three Kingdoms'', silk painting by Sekkan Sakurai (1715-1790). This painting is usually hung in the offices of businessmen to show that they were trustworthy, as these brothers were to each other.]]
